alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Lower Kobuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 11:59PM AKST until January 15 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST MONDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Kivalina and Red Dog Dock, Lower Kobuk Valley and Baldwin Peninsula. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 AM Monday to 6 AM AKST Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could cause power outages.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Peninsula; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Lower Kobuk Valley
